subject: Horse Racing
Horses
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: To spend a day with the trainer Todd Pletcher is to appreciate up close an extraordinary feat of choreography, in which high-tech wizardry is as necessary as plain old horse sense.
snippet: To spend a day with the trainer Todd Pletcher is to appreciate up close an extraordinary feat of choreography, in which high-tech wizardry is as necessary as plain old horse sense.
